channel.title: LSE:SNR on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:SNR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Senior Reports Higher Profit After Sale of Aerostructures Unit
item.description: Senior Plc reported a 10% increase in first-half profit, driven by rising demand for new aircraft and increased defense spending across Europe.
